publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5322 Campbell Martin: Peace Process in the Basque Country—That the Parliament welcomes the current initiative to bring a democratic conclusion to the political conflict in the Basque country and urges all participants to overcome the current impasse and move forward to direct talks at the earliest opportunity, for the sake of peace, progress and democracy.
S2M-5322 Peace Process in the Basque Country (lodged on 13 December 2006) Colin Fox*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Brian Adam*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-5322 Campbell Martin: Peace Process in the Basque Country—That the Parliament welcomes the current initiative to bring a democratic conclusion to the political conflict in the Basque country and urges all participants to overcome the current impasse and move forward to direct talks at the earliest opportunity, for the sake of peace, progress and democracy. Supported by: Colin Fox, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Rosie Kane, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Chris Ballance, Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*, Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5322 Peace Process in the Basque Country (lodged on 13 December 2006) John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5322 Peace Process in the Basque Country (lodged on 13 December 2006) Dennis Canavan*, Dr Jean Turner*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5322 Peace Process in the Basque Country (lodged on 13 December 2006) Alex Neil*

S2M-5322 Campbell Martin: Peace Process in the Basque Country—That the Parliament welcomes the current initiative to bring a democratic conclusion to the political conflict in the Basque country and urges all participants to overcome the current impasse and move forward to direct talks at the earliest opportunity, for the sake of peace, progress and democracy. Supported by: Colin Fox, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Rosie Kane, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Chris Ballance, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Christine Grahame, Bruce Crawford, Eleanor Scott, John Swinburne, Donald Gorrie, Dennis Canavan, Dr Jean Turner, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil
